The wielder throws [[Kubikiribōchō]] at the opponent, dealing damage as it spins towards them. If the Kubikiribōchō gets lodged in something in its path, such as the trunk of a tree, a person can stand on it.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 11, page 18</ref>

== Trivia ==
* While this technique wasn't named in the manga and anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja]]''.
